Elevate your Web Media Experience!

The Castera Media Assistant chrome extension finds information about video and audio in a web page and presents that information to you in a user-friendly manner. With its focus on simplicity and ease-of-use, the assistant aims to differentiate itself from other Chrome extensions.

Video blog users, students and researchers all find Castera to be the go-to solution for getting title, links, description, available downloads and thumbnails for many video services.

With this Chrome Extension you can:

* Navigate to video service landing pages or to a page that contains an embedded video
* The extension will show a badge with the number of videos found on the page
* You can click the extension popup to see a list of videos that were detected
* You can click the detail view of an individual video then have these actions available:
  * Play the video
  * View the related URLâ€™s
  * Copy the text information about the video, into the clipboard
  * Send an email with information about the video
  * Bookmark a video
  * Archive a Bookmark

We hope that you enjoy this free product, find it useful and tell your friends about it.

Happy Watching!
-Team Castera
